lore: Making a Cataclysm is riskyâ€”sometimes it results in the lab blowing up.\n\nThe Oceanic Cataclysm spins a whirlpool at insane speeds. Anyone who touches it risks being sucked in and drowned by its overwhelming force.
menagerieDialog: (It's calm for once, gently pulsing with ethereal energy.)
I am the storm that ends worlds. Point me at our foes!
The secrets of the universe flow through me. What would you like to know?
The elements themselves bend to my will. No force can harm me!
(It's swirling violently, barely contained within its form.)
name: Oceanic Cataclysm
